  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/orlalowe" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Orla Lowe</a>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/orlalowe">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">orlalowe</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr"><a href="/hashtag/Conservative?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Conservative</b></a> Parliamentary Candidate for Neath in <a href="/hashtag/GE2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GE2017</b></a>.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">George Freeman MP Retweeted Anne Jenkin</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">So pleased to join <a href="/Women2Win" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="259191430"><s>@</s><b>Women2Win</b></a> <a href="/Baronessjenkin" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="334551644"><s>@</s><b>Baronessjenkin</b></a> <a href="/VirginiaCrosbie" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="855455848377798657"><s>@</s><b>VirginiaCrosbie</b></a> <a href="/lauraemilyd" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="25977114"><s>@</s><b>lauraemilyd</b></a> <a href="/ReshamKotecha" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="814984682"><s>@</s><b>ReshamKotecha</b></a> <a href="/theodoraclarke" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="61052508"><s>@</s><b>theodoraclarke</b></a> <a href="/Molly4Wstow" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2863863873"><s>@</s><b>Molly4Wstow</b></a> &amp; 30 other outstanding <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a> Women Candidates for excellent <a href="/hashtag/Women2Win?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Women2Win</b></a> training weekend in <a href="/hashtag/LeeValley?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>LeeValley</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Cheshunt?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Cheshunt</b></a>.  <a href="/hashtag/AskHerToStand?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>AskHerToStand</b></a><a href="https://t.co/a0QmOofxv3" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/baronessjenkin/status/977942633908719617" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/baronessjenkin/status/977942633908719617"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/baronessjenkin</span><span class="invisible">/status/977942633908719617</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">George Freeman MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Baronessjenkin/status/977942633908719617" data-conversation-id="977942633908719617" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="977942633908719617" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Baronessjenkin" data-user-id="334551644" href="/Baronessjenkin/status/977942633908719617" data-conversation-id="977942633908719617" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Anne Jenkin</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Baronessjenkin</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Pleasure to support so many talented women <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Conservatives</b></span>.         <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Labour have been in power in Wales for 19 years. 

Theyve overseen two decades of failure with our schools the worst in the UK, 1-in-7 people in Wales on an NHS waiting list and the lowest take-home pay of all UK nations. 

Its time to <a href="/hashtag/ChangeWales?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ChangeWales</b></a>.<a href="https://t.co/iTGIVI0lcv" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/iTGIVI0lcv</a></p>
</div>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="970266186993815553" id="stream-item-tweet-970266186993815553" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;970266186993815553&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">An empowering and fantastic <a href="/hashtag/vote100?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>vote100</b></a> celebration in Westminster Hall this evening. Our Co-Founder <a href="/Baronessjenkin" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="334551644"><s>@</s><b>Baronessjenkin</b></a> and Director <a href="/VirginiaCrosbie" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="855455848377798657"><s>@</s><b>VirginiaCrosbie</b></a> joined W2W Co-Founder and PM <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></a> along with MPs past and present to mark this special milestone. <a href="/hashtag/AskHerToStand?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>AskHerToStand</b></a><a href="https://t.co/OP9F48s4GW" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/OP9F48s4GW</a></p>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

    </div>
  </div>
</div>

</li>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">46</span>
  </span>

  </button>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The <a href="/fmwales" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="191862712"><s>@</s><b>fmwales</b></a> Carwyn Jones and his Labour Welsh Government block an Assembly inquiry into the serious allegations of bullying and intimidation made by his former minister, Leighton Andrews, and former SpAd, Steve Jones. 

All opposition parties voted for the inquiry.<a href="https://t.co/9SpSOPGXB6" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/9SpSOPGXB6</a></p>

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-935609950260297728">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/AssemblyWales" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="29462762"><s>@</s><b>AssemblyWales</b></a> is currently debating the Labour Government's plans to abolish the 'Right to Buy' in Wales.

Labours decision undermines social mobility, depriving thousands of families of an opportunity to get on the housing ladder.

The fight is being led by <a href="/DavidMeldingAM" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="866941386595209216"><s>@</s><b>DavidMeldingAM</b></a>.<a href="https://t.co/1ZvIwd4UNw" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/1ZvIwd4UNw</a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="933435196602494977" data-item-id="933435196602494977" data-permalink-path="/orlalowe/status/933435196602494977" data-conversation-id="933435196602494977" data-tweet-nonce="933435196602494977-877307c9-f2d8-4216-98ef-466007700a56" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="orlalowe" data-name="Orla Lowe" data-user-id="3239440108" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="Conservatives Women2Win" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3239440108&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;orlalowe&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Orla Lowe&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Orla Lowe&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Orla Lowe&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;14281853&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;Conservatives&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Conservatives&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Conservatives&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Conservatives&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;259191430&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;Women2Win&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Women2Win&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Women2Win&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Women2Win&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/orlalowe" data-user-id="3239440108">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/850704455049895937/tLI9UnKV_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Orla Lowe</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>orlalowe</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The last couple of days have proven, once again, how keen the <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a> are to attract female candidates and the amazing support on offer-if you want to get involved, feel free to message me. Thanks to <a href="/Women2Win" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="259191430"><s>@</s><b>Women2Win</b></a> Wales + <a href="/Women2Win" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="259191430"><s>@</s><b>Women2Win</b></a>, for organising the events at <a href="/hashtag/Westminster?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Westminster</b></a></p>
</div>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="876823123403866112" id="stream-item-tweet-876823123403866112" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;876823123403866112&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="866020444100546560" data-item-id="866020444100546560" data-permalink-path="/JoCoxFoundation/status/866020444100546560" data-conversation-id="866020444100546560" data-tweet-nonce="866020444100546560-06f1848c-773c-46af-a00a-1cad1add7e16" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="866387157329608706" data-retweeter="orlalowe" data-screen-name="JoCoxFoundation" data-name="Jo Cox Foundation" data-user-id="761234166985945088" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;761234166985945088&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;JoCoxFoundation&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Jo Cox Foundation&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Jo Cox Foundation&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Jo Cox Foundation&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3239440108&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;orlalowe&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Orla Lowe&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Orla Lowe&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Orla Lowe&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thinking of <a href="/hashtag/JoCox?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>JoCox</b></a> today. Her passion, and determination to make the world a better place. And  her family. <a href="/hashtag/Moreincommon?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Moreincommon</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/GreatGetTogether?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GreatGetTogether</b></a><a href="https://t.co/cDg9yC4hR0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/mrbrendancox/status/866172909437497344" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/mrbrendancox/status/866172909437497344"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/mrbrendancox/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/866172909437497344</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Anne Jenkin added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="866172909437497344" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="MrBrendanCox" data-user-id="133407633" href="/MrBrendanCox/status/866172909437497344" data-conversation-id="866172909437497344" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

  </div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Barnett formula has been changed. Welsh Gov v happy to sign new arrangement last Dec. Wales receives around 120 for every 100 spent in Eng</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Well done Matthew Rees - such a kind thing to do!<a href="https://t.co/mgPYrRnhZB" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ITVWales/status/856191335044456448" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ITVWales/status/856191335044456448"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ITVWales/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/856191335044456448</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Orla Lowe added,</p>

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>

      <div class="modal-header">
        <h3 class="modal-title embed-tweet-title">Embed this Tweet</h3>
        <h3 class="modal-title embed-video-title">Embed this Video</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="modal-body">
        <div class="embed-code-container">
  <p class="embed-tweet-instructions">Add this Tweet to your website by copying the code below. <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/web/embedded-tweets" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a></p>
  <p class="embed-video-instructions">Add this video to your website by copying the code below. <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/web/embedded-tweets" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a></p>
  <form class="t1-form">

    <div class="embed-destination-wrapper">
      <div class="embed-overlay embed-overlay-spinner"><div class="embed-overlay-content"></div></div>
      <div class="embed-overlay embed-overlay-error">
        <p class="embed-overlay-content">Hmm, there was a problem reaching the server. <button type="button" class="btn-link retry-embed">Try again?</button></p>
      </div>
      <textarea class="embed-destination js-initial-focus"></textarea>
      <div class="embed-options">
        <div class="embed-include-parent-tweet">
          <label class="t1-label" for="include-parent-tweet">
            <input type="checkbox" id="include-parent-tweet" class="include-parent-tweet" checked="" />
            Include parent Tweet
          </label>
        </div>
        <div class="embed-include-card">
          <label class="t1-label" for="include-card">
            <input type="checkbox" id="include-card" class="include-card" checked="" />
            Include media
          </label>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </form>
  <p class="embed-tweet-description">By embedding Twitter content in your website or app, you are agreeing to the Twitter <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/overview/terms/agreement" rel="noopener">Developer Agreement</a> and <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/overview/terms/policy" rel="noopener">Developer Policy</a>.</p>
  <h3 class="embed-preview-header">Preview</h3>
  <div class="embed-preview">
  </div>
</div>

    </div>
  </div>

  if(window.ttft){
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
  }
